metadata.name: INNER DEM0NS
metadata.description:
The theme of our collaboration is the inner struggle and living with it. The inner struggles, inner demons, are known by all of us. 
In all of us lives an Oni. Some of us are letting this Oni out and it rages recklessly. Some of us are fighting against it every day. 
Especially from 2020 on, when everyone had to take care of themselves, physically and mentally, we all got to know our Oni a little better. 
All in all the message of our work is that the fight is worth it. 

If we keep our Onis in check, nothing can stop us.

Léon and Duke 







3508 × 4961
